name: Trash Horror Collection
description:
The graphic style is inspired by old ps1 games. We have filter options in every game for people who don't like pixelated games.



Developer's Note:
This collection contains 10 games, some are much longer than others. The term "Trash" doesn't mean it's bad, it's a style of horror based on the cult horror movies of the 80's and 90's, having a different style of horror with an over-the-top twist and even comedy.
